about_the_game:
You will play the role of Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, who causes chaos in the Heavenly Palace and sweeps away demons and monsters in the heavenly realm in order to save his fourth sister who was captured by immortals.

Causing chaos in the Heavenly Palace, restoring classics

Restoring the classic scene of Sun Wukong causing chaos in the Heavenly Palace in Journey to the West.

Pavilions in the air, grand and imposing

The magnificent Heavenly Palace awaits your exploration.

Heavenly soldiers and generals, each displaying their own divine abilities

One hundred thousand heavenly soldiers and generals are controlled by demons, and the Great Sage will once again wreak havoc in the Heavenly Palace to save Fourth Sister!

name: Unreal Wukong: Heavenly Palace
short_description: You will play the role of Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, who causes chaos in the Heavenly Palace and sweeps away demons and monsters in the heavenly realm in order to save his fourth sister who was captured by immortals.
